Tick-Counter View of GR (worked example)

\[ds^2 = \Bigl(1-\frac{2GM}{rc^2}\Bigr)c^2 dt^2 - \dots\]

\[\frac{\nu_\infty}{\nu_r} = \frac{N_{\mathrm{tick}}(\infty)}{N_{\mathrm{tick}}(r)}.\]
